import emailjs from 'emailjs-com' const Contact = () => { const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs.sendForm('gmail', 'template_in8543k', e.target, 'user_ujkxZV40fBGbCk7Vh860d') .then((result) => { console.log(result.text) }, (error) => { console.log(error.text) }) } return (

Contact me

New York

) } export default Contact
